item.title: Danny Yagan - About
item.description: Curriculum vitae. Positions: Economics professor at the University of California-Berkeley, faculty research fellow of the National Bureau of Economic Research, associate director of the Burch Center for Tax Policy and Public Finance, and faculty director of the taxation and inequality initiative of the Berkeley Opportunity Lab. Research: U.S. tax policy, business investment, recession recovery, income inequality, and upward mobility. Education: BA and PhD in economics from Harvard. Teaching: Undergraduate-level and PhD-level Public Sector Economics (the economics of government policy).
